alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Dallas; Hamilton; Johnson; Kaufman; Mills; Rains; Rockwall; Tarrant; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 11:52PM CDT until October 31 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Tarrant, Dallas, Rockwall, Kaufman, Van Zandt, Rains, Johnson, Mills, Hamilton and Bosque Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Turn sprinkler systems off, as they can create icy sidewalks and roads for both vehicles and pedestrians alike. Make sure outdoor plumbing and faucets are covered and protected from the freezing temperatures. Check to make sure sure livestock and outdoors or pets have protection from the chilly temperatures.
info.instruction: A Freeze Warning means that the season`s first episode of sub- freezing temperatures are likely to occur. These conditions will kill sensitive plants, and residents are advised to protect tender vegetation. Automatic sprinkler systems should also be turned off to avoid creating ice patches on nearby roads, driveways, and sidewalks.

area.areaDesc: Bosque; Dallas; Hamilton; Johnson; Kaufman; Mills; Rains; Rockwall; Tarrant; Van Zandt
